channel.title: How do u change what outfit u start with
channel.description:
How can i edit which outfit ppl start with?
Thanks

item.title: How do u change what outfit u start with
item.dc:creator: @hey_w8_u_nub hey w8 u nub
item.description:
@hey_w8_u_nub wrote:

Go to player.java and hit ctrl+f and type in unique, then tjust change the id’s of the item to what you want
example:
// Giving the player an unique look
playerEquipment[playerHat]=14860;
playerEquipment[playerCape]=1725;
playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
playerEquipment[playerChest]=14638;
playerEquipment[playerShield]=13601;
playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4087;
playerEquipment[playerHands]=7462;
playerEquipment[playerFeet]=15352;
playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735;
playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;
it should look like this.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u change what outfit u start with

item.title: How do u change what outfit u start with
item.dc:creator: @monkeykid300 monkeykid300
item.description:
@monkeykid300 wrote:

i remember changing it on my server. It was pretty easy. Find the items you want for the new starter look. Then open your client.java file. (One you can actually read) Next search by using ctrl+f to find the id of any id in the original look. If that doesn’t work then my only thing is try the same thing only in the player file.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u change what outfit u start with
